projects.title: CloudForge
projects.bodyText:
- A cloud-native DevOps pipeline with GitOps and Terraform.
- CI/CD with Jenkins and Groovy scripting.
- Infrastructure deployed on AWS EKS using Terraform.
- LLM-powered chatbot for CVE search using Hugging Face and vector embeddings.

projects.title: AskNeu (University RAG Chatbot Platform)
projects.bodyText:
- MLOps pipeline built on GCP for a university chatbot.
- Integrates Vertex AI model with Airflow orchestration.
- End-to-end deployment on GKE with CI/CD using GitHub Actions.
- Data storage and versioning using GCS.

projects.title: CloudCraft
projects.bodyText:
- A full-stack microservice cloud app deployed on GCP.
- Infrastructure provisioned with Terraform and Github Actions.
- Monitored using google ops agent.
- Created a microservice to send verification to users.

projects.title: MachineLearning-Timeseries
projects.bodyText:
- Time Series forecasting and anomaly detection.
- Models include ARIMA and LSTM.
- Python notebooks used for data visualization and model training.

projects.title: CarPoolEasy
projects.bodyText:
- A ride-sharing coordination web app.
- Tracks routes, requests, and ride statuses.
- Built with Java for backend, JavaFX for frontend and real-time updates.

projects.title: Miniproject_IOT
projects.bodyText:
- Real-time sensor data collection using Raspberry Pi.
- Data sent via MQTT to a cloud dashboard.
- Focus on edge computing and lightweight protocol design.

projects.title: Iot-WildGuard-System
projects.bodyText:
- IoT system for detecting wild animal movements.
- Utilizes edge sensors and ESP32.
- Sends alerts through MQTT and displays data on a real-time dashboard.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.bodyText:
- A minimalist portfolio built in React and hosted on GitHub Pages.
- Fully customizable via JSON config.
- Includes resume, project showcase, and contact info.
